meanings.definition: A person who operates a birler (noun)
meanings.sent1: The birler fixed the machine with skill.
meanings.sent2: The birler worked diligently on the equipment.
meanings.sent3: The birler accidentally pressed the wrong button, causing a funny noise.
meanings.sent4: She was a birler of emotions, always knowing how to handle any situation.
meanings.sent5: The birler's expertise in machinery was unmatched in the workshop.

meanings.sent1: He will birler the device to make it function properly.
meanings.sent2: She birlered the tool with precision and care.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to birler the toy in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: The musician birlered the guitar strings, creating a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: They birlered the engine back to life after hours of hard work.
